module Network.AWS.CostAndUsageReport.Types.ReportDefinition

-- | The definition of AWS Cost and Usage Report. You can specify the
--   report name, time unit, report format, compression format, S3 bucket,
--   additional artifacts, and schema elements in the definition.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newReportDefinition</a> smart constructor.
data ReportDefinition
ReportDefinition' :: Maybe ReportVersioning -> Maybe [AdditionalArtifact] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Text -> TimeUnit -> ReportFormat -> CompressionFormat -> [SchemaElement] -> Text -> Text -> AWSRegion -> ReportDefinition

-- | Whether you want Amazon Web Services to overwrite the previous version
--   of each report or to deliver the report in addition to the previous
--   versions.
[$sel:reportVersioning:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Maybe ReportVersioning

-- | A list of manifests that you want Amazon Web Services to create for
--   this report.
[$sel:additionalArtifacts:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Maybe [AdditionalArtifact]

-- | The Amazon resource name of the billing view. You can get this value
--   by using the billing view service public APIs.
[$sel:billingViewArn:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether you want Amazon Web Services to update your reports after they
--   have been finalized if Amazon Web Services detects charges related to
--   previous months. These charges can include refunds, credits, or
--   support fees.
[$sel:refreshClosedReports:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Maybe Bool
[$sel:reportName:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Text
[$sel:timeUnit:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> TimeUnit
[$sel:format:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> ReportFormat
[$sel:compression:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> CompressionFormat

-- | A list of strings that indicate additional content that Amazon Web
--   Services includes in the report, such as individual resource IDs.
[$sel:additionalSchemaElements:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> [SchemaElement]
[$sel:s3Bucket:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Text
[$sel:s3Prefix:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Text
[$sel:s3Region:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> AWSRegion

-- | Create a value of <a>ReportDefinition</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportVersioning:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_reportVersioning</a> - Whether you want Amazon Web
--   Services to overwrite the previous version of each report or to
--   deliver the report in addition to the previous versions.
--   
--   <a>$sel:additionalArtifacts:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_additionalArtifacts</a> - A list of manifests that
--   you want Amazon Web Services to create for this report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:billingViewArn:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_billingViewArn</a> - The Amazon resource name of
--   the billing view. You can get this value by using the billing view
--   service public APIs.
--   
--   <a>$sel:refreshClosedReports:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_refreshClosedReports</a> - Whether you want Amazon
--   Web Services to update your reports after they have been finalized if
--   Amazon Web Services detects charges related to previous months. These
--   charges can include refunds, credits, or support fees.
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportName:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_reportName</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:timeUnit:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_timeUnit</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:format:ReportDefinition'</a>, <a>reportDefinition_format</a> -
--   Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:compression:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_compression</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:additionalSchemaElements:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_additionalSchemaElements</a> - A list of strings
--   that indicate additional content that Amazon Web Services includes in
--   the report, such as individual resource IDs.

--   <a>$sel:s3Prefix:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_s3Prefix</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3Region:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_s3Region</a> - Undocumented member.
newReportDefinition :: Text -> TimeUnit -> ReportFormat -> CompressionFormat -> Text -> Text -> AWSRegion -> ReportDefinition

-- | Whether you want Amazon Web Services to overwrite the previous version
--   of each report or to deliver the report in addition to the previous
--   versions.
reportDefinition_reportVersioning :: Lens' ReportDefinition (Maybe ReportVersioning)

-- | A list of manifests that you want Amazon Web Services to create for
--   this report.
reportDefinition_additionalArtifacts :: Lens' ReportDefinition (Maybe [AdditionalArtifact])

-- | The Amazon resource name of the billing view. You can get this value
--   by using the billing view service public APIs.
reportDefinition_billingViewArn :: Lens' ReportDefinition (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether you want Amazon Web Services to update your reports after they
--   have been finalized if Amazon Web Services detects charges related to
--   previous months. These charges can include refunds, credits, or
--   support fees.
reportDefinition_refreshClosedReports :: Lens' ReportDefinition (Maybe Bool)

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_reportName :: Lens' ReportDefinition Text

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_timeUnit :: Lens' ReportDefinition TimeUnit

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_format :: Lens' ReportDefinition ReportFormat

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_compression :: Lens' ReportDefinition CompressionFormat

-- | A list of strings that indicate additional content that Amazon Web
--   Services includes in the report, such as individual resource IDs.
reportDefinition_additionalSchemaElements :: Lens' ReportDefinition [SchemaElement]

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_s3Bucket :: Lens' ReportDefinition Text

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_s3Prefix :: Lens' ReportDefinition Text

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_s3Region :: Lens' ReportDefinition AWSRegion

module Network.AWS.CostAndUsageReport.Types

-- | API version <tt>2017-01-06</tt> of the Amazon Cost and Usage Report
--   Service SDK configuration.
defaultService :: Service

-- | A report with the specified name already exists in the account.
--   Specify a different report name.
_DuplicateReportNameException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | An error on the server occurred during the processing of your request.
--   Try again later.
_InternalErrorException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | This account already has five reports defined. To define a new report,
--   you must delete an existing report.
_ReportLimitReachedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The input fails to satisfy the constraints specified by an AWS
--   service.
_ValidationException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The region of the S3 bucket that AWS delivers the report into.
newtype AWSRegion
AWSRegion' :: Text -> AWSRegion
[fromAWSRegion] :: AWSRegion -> Text
pattern AWSRegion_Af_south_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_east_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_northeast_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_northeast_2 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_northeast_3 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_south_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_southeast_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_southeast_2 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ca_central_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Cn_north_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Cn_northwest_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Eu_central_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Eu_north_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Eu_south_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Eu_west_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Eu_west_2 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Eu_west_3 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Me_south_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Sa_east_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Us_east_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Us_east_2 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Us_west_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Us_west_2 :: AWSRegion

-- | The types of manifest that you want AWS to create for this report.
newtype AdditionalArtifact
AdditionalArtifact' :: Text -> AdditionalArtifact
[fromAdditionalArtifact] :: AdditionalArtifact -> Text
pattern AdditionalArtifact_ATHENA :: AdditionalArtifact
pattern AdditionalArtifact_QUICKSIGHT :: AdditionalArtifact
pattern AdditionalArtifact_REDSHIFT :: AdditionalArtifact

-- | The compression format that AWS uses for the report.
newtype CompressionFormat
CompressionFormat' :: Text -> CompressionFormat
[fromCompressionFormat] :: CompressionFormat -> Text
pattern CompressionFormat_GZIP :: CompressionFormat
pattern CompressionFormat_Parquet :: CompressionFormat
pattern CompressionFormat_ZIP :: CompressionFormat

-- | The format that AWS saves the report in.
newtype ReportFormat
ReportFormat' :: Text -> ReportFormat
[fromReportFormat] :: ReportFormat -> Text
pattern ReportFormat_Parquet :: ReportFormat
pattern ReportFormat_TextORcsv :: ReportFormat
newtype ReportVersioning
ReportVersioning' :: Text -> ReportVersioning
[fromReportVersioning] :: ReportVersioning -> Text
pattern ReportVersioning_CREATE_NEW_REPORT :: ReportVersioning
pattern ReportVersioning_OVERWRITE_REPORT :: ReportVersioning

-- | Whether or not AWS includes resource IDs in the report.
newtype SchemaElement
SchemaElement' :: Text -> SchemaElement
[fromSchemaElement] :: SchemaElement -> Text
pattern SchemaElement_RESOURCES :: SchemaElement

-- | The length of time covered by the report.
newtype TimeUnit
TimeUnit' :: Text -> TimeUnit
[fromTimeUnit] :: TimeUnit -> Text
pattern TimeUnit_DAILY :: TimeUnit
pattern TimeUnit_HOURLY :: TimeUnit
pattern TimeUnit_MONTHLY :: TimeUnit

-- | The definition of AWS Cost and Usage Report. You can specify the
--   report name, time unit, report format, compression format, S3 bucket,
--   additional artifacts, and schema elements in the definition.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newReportDefinition</a> smart constructor.
data ReportDefinition
ReportDefinition' :: Maybe ReportVersioning -> Maybe [AdditionalArtifact] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Text -> TimeUnit -> ReportFormat -> CompressionFormat -> [SchemaElement] -> Text -> Text -> AWSRegion -> ReportDefinition

-- | Whether you want Amazon Web Services to overwrite the previous version
--   of each report or to deliver the report in addition to the previous
--   versions.
[$sel:reportVersioning:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Maybe ReportVersioning

-- | A list of manifests that you want Amazon Web Services to create for
--   this report.
[$sel:additionalArtifacts:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Maybe [AdditionalArtifact]

-- | The Amazon resource name of the billing view. You can get this value
--   by using the billing view service public APIs.
[$sel:billingViewArn:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether you want Amazon Web Services to update your reports after they
--   have been finalized if Amazon Web Services detects charges related to
--   previous months. These charges can include refunds, credits, or
--   support fees.
[$sel:refreshClosedReports:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Maybe Bool
[$sel:reportName:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Text
[$sel:timeUnit:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> TimeUnit
[$sel:format:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> ReportFormat
[$sel:compression:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> CompressionFormat

-- | A list of strings that indicate additional content that Amazon Web
--   Services includes in the report, such as individual resource IDs.
[$sel:additionalSchemaElements:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> [SchemaElement]
[$sel:s3Bucket:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Text
[$sel:s3Prefix:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> Text
[$sel:s3Region:ReportDefinition'] :: ReportDefinition -> AWSRegion

-- | Create a value of <a>ReportDefinition</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportVersioning:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_reportVersioning</a> - Whether you want Amazon Web
--   Services to overwrite the previous version of each report or to
--   deliver the report in addition to the previous versions.
--   
--   <a>$sel:additionalArtifacts:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_additionalArtifacts</a> - A list of manifests that
--   you want Amazon Web Services to create for this report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:billingViewArn:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_billingViewArn</a> - The Amazon resource name of
--   the billing view. You can get this value by using the billing view
--   service public APIs.
--   
--   <a>$sel:refreshClosedReports:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_refreshClosedReports</a> - Whether you want Amazon
--   Web Services to update your reports after they have been finalized if
--   Amazon Web Services detects charges related to previous months. These
--   charges can include refunds, credits, or support fees.
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportName:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_reportName</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:timeUnit:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_timeUnit</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:format:ReportDefinition'</a>, <a>reportDefinition_format</a> -
--   Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:compression:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_compression</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:additionalSchemaElements:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_additionalSchemaElements</a> - A list of strings
--   that indicate additional content that Amazon Web Services includes in
--   the report, such as individual resource IDs.
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3Bucket:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_s3Bucket</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3Prefix:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_s3Prefix</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3Region:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_s3Region</a> - Undocumented member.
newReportDefinition :: Text -> TimeUnit -> ReportFormat -> CompressionFormat -> Text -> Text -> AWSRegion -> ReportDefinition

-- | Whether you want Amazon Web Services to overwrite the previous version
--   of each report or to deliver the report in addition to the previous
--   versions.
reportDefinition_reportVersioning :: Lens' ReportDefinition (Maybe ReportVersioning)

-- | A list of manifests that you want Amazon Web Services to create for
--   this report.
reportDefinition_additionalArtifacts :: Lens' ReportDefinition (Maybe [AdditionalArtifact])

-- | The Amazon resource name of the billing view. You can get this value
--   by using the billing view service public APIs.
reportDefinition_billingViewArn :: Lens' ReportDefinition (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether you want Amazon Web Services to update your reports after they
--   have been finalized if Amazon Web Services detects charges related to
--   previous months. These charges can include refunds, credits, or
--   support fees.
reportDefinition_refreshClosedReports :: Lens' ReportDefinition (Maybe Bool)

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_reportName :: Lens' ReportDefinition Text

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_timeUnit :: Lens' ReportDefinition TimeUnit

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_format :: Lens' ReportDefinition ReportFormat

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_compression :: Lens' ReportDefinition CompressionFormat

-- | A list of strings that indicate additional content that Amazon Web
--   Services includes in the report, such as individual resource IDs.
reportDefinition_additionalSchemaElements :: Lens' ReportDefinition [SchemaElement]

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_s3Bucket :: Lens' ReportDefinition Text

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_s3Prefix :: Lens' ReportDefinition Text

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_s3Region :: Lens' ReportDefinition AWSRegion


-- | Creates a new report using the description that you provide.
module Network.AWS.CostAndUsageReport.PutReportDefinition

-- | Creates a Cost and Usage Report.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPutReportDefinition</a> smart constructor.
data PutReportDefinition
PutReportDefinition' :: ReportDefinition -> PutReportDefinition

-- | Represents the output of the PutReportDefinition operation. The
--   content consists of the detailed metadata and data file information.
[$sel:reportDefinition:PutReportDefinition'] :: PutReportDefinition -> ReportDefinition

-- | Create a value of <a>PutReportDefinition</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportDefinition:PutReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>putReportDefinition_reportDefinition</a> - Represents the output of
--   the PutReportDefinition operation. The content consists of the
--   detailed metadata and data file information.
newPutReportDefinition :: ReportDefinition -> PutReportDefinition

-- | Represents the output of the PutReportDefinition operation. The
--   content consists of the detailed metadata and data file information.
putReportDefinition_reportDefinition :: Lens' PutReportDefinition ReportDefinition

-- | If the action is successful, the service sends back an HTTP 200
--   response with an empty HTTP body.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPutReportDefinitionResponse</a> smart constructor.
data PutReportDefinitionResponse
PutReportDefinitionResponse' :: Int -> PutReportDefinitionResponse

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:PutReportDefinitionResponse'] :: PutReportDefinitionResponse -> Int

--   fields omitted.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

-- | Lists the AWS Cost and Usage reports available to this account.
--   
--   This operation returns paginated results.
module Network.AWS.CostAndUsageReport.DescribeReportDefinitions

-- | Requests a list of AWS Cost and Usage reports owned by the account.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDescribeReportDefinitions</a> smart constructor.

-- | Deletes the specified report.
module Network.AWS.CostAndUsageReport.DeleteReportDefinition

-- | Deletes the specified report.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDeleteReportDefinition</a> smart constructor.
data DeleteReportDefinition
DeleteReportDefinition' :: Maybe Text -> DeleteReportDefinition

-- | The name of the report that you want to delete. The name must be
--   unique, is case sensitive, and can't include spaces.
[$sel:reportName:DeleteReportDefinition'] :: DeleteReportDefinition -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>DeleteReportDefinition</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportName:DeleteReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>deleteReportDefinition_reportName</a> - The name of the report that
--   you want to delete. The name must be unique, is case sensitive, and
--   can't include spaces.
newDeleteReportDefinition :: DeleteReportDefinition

-- | The name of the report that you want to delete. The name must be
--   unique, is case sensitive, and can't include spaces.
deleteReportDefinition_reportName :: Lens' DeleteReportDefinition (Maybe Text)

-- | If the action is successful, the service sends back an HTTP 200
--   response.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDeleteReportDefinitionResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.
data DeleteReportDefinitionResponse
DeleteReportDefinitionResponse' :: Maybe Text -> Int -> DeleteReportDefinitionResponse
[$sel:responseMessage:DeleteReportDefinitionResponse'] :: DeleteReportDefinitionResponse -> Maybe Text

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:DeleteReportDefinitionResponse'] :: DeleteReportDefinitionResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>DeleteReportDefinitionResponse</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:responseMessage:DeleteReportDefinitionResponse'</a>,
--   <a>deleteReportDefinitionResponse_responseMessage</a> - Undocumented
--   member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:DeleteReportDefinitionResponse'</a>,
--   <a>deleteReportDefinitionResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http
--   status code.
newDeleteReportDefinitionResponse :: Int -> DeleteReportDefinitionResponse

-- | Undocumented member.

--   content consists of the detailed metadata and data file information.

-- | The response's http status code.

--   of each report or to deliver the report in addition to the previous
--   versions.
reportDefinition_reportVersioning :: Lens' ReportDefinition (Maybe ReportVersioning)

-- | A list of manifests that you want Amazon Web Services to create for
--   this report.
reportDefinition_additionalArtifacts :: Lens' ReportDefinition (Maybe [AdditionalArtifact])

-- | The Amazon resource name of the billing view. You can get this value
--   by using the billing view service public APIs.
reportDefinition_billingViewArn :: Lens' ReportDefinition (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether you want Amazon Web Services to update your reports after they
--   have been finalized if Amazon Web Services detects charges related to
--   previous months. These charges can include refunds, credits, or
--   support fees.
reportDefinition_refreshClosedReports :: Lens' ReportDefinition (Maybe Bool)

reportDefinition_timeUnit :: Lens' ReportDefinition TimeUnit

-- | Undocumented member.

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_compression :: Lens' ReportDefinition CompressionFormat

-- | A list of strings that indicate additional content that Amazon Web
--   Services includes in the report, such as individual resource IDs.
reportDefinition_additionalSchemaElements :: Lens' ReportDefinition [SchemaElement]

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_s3Bucket :: Lens' ReportDefinition Text

-- | Undocumented member.
reportDefinition_s3Prefix :: Lens' ReportDefinition Text

-- | Undocumented member.

module Network.AWS.CostAndUsageReport.Waiters


-- | Derived from API version <tt>2017-01-06</tt> of the AWS service
--   descriptions, licensed under Apache 2.0.
--   
--   The AWS Cost and Usage Report API enables you to programmatically
--   create, query, and delete AWS Cost and Usage report definitions.
--   
--   AWS Cost and Usage reports track the monthly AWS costs and usage
--   associated with your AWS account. The report contains line items for
--   each unique combination of AWS product, usage type, and operation that
--   your AWS account uses. You can configure the AWS Cost and Usage report
--   to show only the data that you want, using the AWS Cost and Usage API.
--   
--   Service Endpoint
--   
--   The AWS Cost and Usage Report API provides the following endpoint:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>cur.us-east-1.amazonaws.com</li>
--   </ul>
module Network.AWS.CostAndUsageReport

-- | API version <tt>2017-01-06</tt> of the Amazon Cost and Usage Report
--   Service SDK configuration.
defaultService :: Service

-- | A report with the specified name already exists in the account.
--   Specify a different report name.
_DuplicateReportNameException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | An error on the server occurred during the processing of your request.
--   Try again later.
_InternalErrorException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | This account already has five reports defined. To define a new report,
--   you must delete an existing report.
_ReportLimitReachedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The input fails to satisfy the constraints specified by an AWS
--   service.
_ValidationException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newModifyReportDefinition</a> smart constructor.
data ModifyReportDefinition
ModifyReportDefinition' :: Text -> ReportDefinition -> ModifyReportDefinition

-- | Create a value of <a>ModifyReportDefinition</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportName:ModifyReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>modifyReportDefinition_reportName</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportDefinition:ModifyReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>modifyReportDefinition_reportDefinition</a> - Undocumented member.
newModifyReportDefinition :: Text -> ReportDefinition -> ModifyReportDefinition

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newModifyReportDefinitionResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.
data ModifyReportDefinitionResponse
ModifyReportDefinitionResponse' :: Int -> ModifyReportDefinitionResponse

-- | Create a value of <a>ModifyReportDefinitionResponse</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:ModifyReportDefinitionResponse'</a>,
--   <a>modifyReportDefinitionResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http
--   status code.
newModifyReportDefinitionResponse :: Int -> ModifyReportDefinitionResponse

-- | Deletes the specified report.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDeleteReportDefinition</a> smart constructor.
data DeleteReportDefinition
DeleteReportDefinition' :: Maybe Text -> DeleteReportDefinition

-- | Create a value of <a>DeleteReportDefinition</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportName:DeleteReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>deleteReportDefinition_reportName</a> - The name of the report that
--   you want to delete. The name must be unique, is case sensitive, and
--   can't include spaces.
newDeleteReportDefinition :: DeleteReportDefinition

-- | If the action is successful, the service sends back an HTTP 200
--   response.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDeleteReportDefinitionResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.
data DeleteReportDefinitionResponse
DeleteReportDefinitionResponse' :: Maybe Text -> Int -> DeleteReportDefinitionResponse

-- | Create a value of <a>DeleteReportDefinitionResponse</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:responseMessage:DeleteReportDefinitionResponse'</a>,
--   <a>deleteReportDefinitionResponse_responseMessage</a> - Undocumented
--   member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:DeleteReportDefinitionResponse'</a>,
--   <a>deleteReportDefinitionResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http
--   status code.
newDeleteReportDefinitionResponse :: Int -> DeleteReportDefinitionResponse

-- | Requests a list of AWS Cost and Usage reports owned by the account.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDescribeReportDefinitions</a> smart constructor.
data DescribeReportDefinitions
DescribeReportDefinitions' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Natural -> DescribeReportDefinitions

-- | Create a value of <a>DescribeReportDefinitions</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:nextToken:DescribeReportDefinitions'</a>,
--   <a>describeReportDefinitions_nextToken</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maxResults:DescribeReportDefinitions'</a>,
--   <a>describeReportDefinitions_maxResults</a> - Undocumented member.
newDescribeReportDefinitions :: DescribeReportDefinitions

-- | If the action is successful, the service sends back an HTTP 200
--   response.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDescribeReportDefinitionsResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.
data DescribeReportDefinitionsResponse
DescribeReportDefinitionsResponse' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe [ReportDefinition] -> Int -> DescribeReportDefinitionsResponse

-- | Create a value of <a>DescribeReportDefinitionsResponse</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:nextToken:DescribeReportDefinitions'</a>,
--   <a>describeReportDefinitionsResponse_nextToken</a> - Undocumented
--   member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportDefinitions:DescribeReportDefinitionsResponse'</a>,
--   <a>describeReportDefinitionsResponse_reportDefinitions</a> - A list of
--   AWS Cost and Usage reports owned by the account.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:DescribeReportDefinitionsResponse'</a>,
--   <a>describeReportDefinitionsResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's
--   http status code.
newDescribeReportDefinitionsResponse :: Int -> DescribeReportDefinitionsResponse

-- | Creates a Cost and Usage Report.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPutReportDefinition</a> smart constructor.
data PutReportDefinition
PutReportDefinition' :: ReportDefinition -> PutReportDefinition

-- | Create a value of <a>PutReportDefinition</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportDefinition:PutReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>putReportDefinition_reportDefinition</a> - Represents the output of
--   the PutReportDefinition operation. The content consists of the
--   detailed metadata and data file information.
newPutReportDefinition :: ReportDefinition -> PutReportDefinition

-- | If the action is successful, the service sends back an HTTP 200
--   response with an empty HTTP body.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPutReportDefinitionResponse</a> smart constructor.
data PutReportDefinitionResponse
PutReportDefinitionResponse' :: Int -> PutReportDefinitionResponse

-- | Create a value of <a>PutReportDefinitionResponse</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:PutReportDefinitionResponse'</a>,
--   <a>putReportDefinitionResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http
--   status code.
newPutReportDefinitionResponse :: Int -> PutReportDefinitionResponse

-- | The region of the S3 bucket that AWS delivers the report into.
newtype AWSRegion
AWSRegion' :: Text -> AWSRegion
[fromAWSRegion] :: AWSRegion -> Text
pattern AWSRegion_Af_south_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_east_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_northeast_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_northeast_2 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_northeast_3 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_south_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_southeast_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ap_southeast_2 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Ca_central_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Cn_north_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Cn_northwest_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Eu_central_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Eu_north_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Eu_south_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Eu_west_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Eu_west_2 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Eu_west_3 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Me_south_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Sa_east_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Us_east_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Us_east_2 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Us_west_1 :: AWSRegion
pattern AWSRegion_Us_west_2 :: AWSRegion

-- | The types of manifest that you want AWS to create for this report.
newtype AdditionalArtifact
AdditionalArtifact' :: Text -> AdditionalArtifact
[fromAdditionalArtifact] :: AdditionalArtifact -> Text
pattern AdditionalArtifact_ATHENA :: AdditionalArtifact
pattern AdditionalArtifact_QUICKSIGHT :: AdditionalArtifact
pattern AdditionalArtifact_REDSHIFT :: AdditionalArtifact

-- | The compression format that AWS uses for the report.
newtype CompressionFormat
CompressionFormat' :: Text -> CompressionFormat
[fromCompressionFormat] :: CompressionFormat -> Text
pattern CompressionFormat_GZIP :: CompressionFormat
pattern CompressionFormat_Parquet :: CompressionFormat
pattern CompressionFormat_ZIP :: CompressionFormat

-- | The format that AWS saves the report in.
newtype ReportFormat
ReportFormat' :: Text -> ReportFormat
[fromReportFormat] :: ReportFormat -> Text
pattern ReportFormat_Parquet :: ReportFormat
pattern ReportFormat_TextORcsv :: ReportFormat
newtype ReportVersioning
ReportVersioning' :: Text -> ReportVersioning
[fromReportVersioning] :: ReportVersioning -> Text
pattern ReportVersioning_CREATE_NEW_REPORT :: ReportVersioning
pattern ReportVersioning_OVERWRITE_REPORT :: ReportVersioning

-- | Whether or not AWS includes resource IDs in the report.
newtype SchemaElement
SchemaElement' :: Text -> SchemaElement
[fromSchemaElement] :: SchemaElement -> Text
pattern SchemaElement_RESOURCES :: SchemaElement

-- | The length of time covered by the report.
newtype TimeUnit
TimeUnit' :: Text -> TimeUnit
[fromTimeUnit] :: TimeUnit -> Text
pattern TimeUnit_DAILY :: TimeUnit
pattern TimeUnit_HOURLY :: TimeUnit
pattern TimeUnit_MONTHLY :: TimeUnit

-- | The definition of AWS Cost and Usage Report. You can specify the
--   report name, time unit, report format, compression format, S3 bucket,
--   additional artifacts, and schema elements in the definition.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newReportDefinition</a> smart constructor.
data ReportDefinition
ReportDefinition' :: Maybe ReportVersioning -> Maybe [AdditionalArtifact] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Text -> TimeUnit -> ReportFormat -> CompressionFormat -> [SchemaElement] -> Text -> Text -> AWSRegion -> ReportDefinition

-- | Create a value of <a>ReportDefinition</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportVersioning:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_reportVersioning</a> - Whether you want Amazon Web
--   Services to overwrite the previous version of each report or to
--   deliver the report in addition to the previous versions.
--   
--   <a>$sel:additionalArtifacts:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_additionalArtifacts</a> - A list of manifests that
--   you want Amazon Web Services to create for this report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:billingViewArn:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_billingViewArn</a> - The Amazon resource name of
--   the billing view. You can get this value by using the billing view
--   service public APIs.
--   
--   <a>$sel:refreshClosedReports:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_refreshClosedReports</a> - Whether you want Amazon
--   Web Services to update your reports after they have been finalized if
--   Amazon Web Services detects charges related to previous months. These
--   charges can include refunds, credits, or support fees.
--   
--   <a>$sel:reportName:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_reportName</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:timeUnit:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_timeUnit</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:format:ReportDefinition'</a>, <a>reportDefinition_format</a> -
--   Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:compression:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_compression</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:additionalSchemaElements:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_additionalSchemaElements</a> - A list of strings
--   that indicate additional content that Amazon Web Services includes in
--   the report, such as individual resource IDs.
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3Bucket:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_s3Bucket</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3Prefix:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_s3Prefix</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3Region:ReportDefinition'</a>,
--   <a>reportDefinition_s3Region</a> - Undocumented member.
newReportDefinition :: Text -> TimeUnit -> ReportFormat -> CompressionFormat -> Text -> Text -> AWSRegion -> ReportDefinition
